name: Cadaval: From Grape to Wine
description:
CONTINUE THE LEGACY OF YOUR GRANDPARENT'S VINEYARD!

After receiving the news that they've inherited a vineyard from their grandparents, our protagonist moves to Cadaval, Portugal, where the vineyard is located, and is motivated and passionate to take care of it, and make the vineyard successful!

What to expect from our game:
  • A winemaking simulation game
  • A game set in the municipality of Cadaval in Portugal
  • Collect achievements to be a completionist!
Credits

Pedro Monteiro (Game Artist)

Nelson Antunes (Game Developer)

Henrique Pereira (Game Designer)
